title: Bug 108822 - More accurate logic needed for processing disk sorting with border values for row values
OB: When sorting data on disk, if there are 40000 rows of data and the program is instructed to process less than 40000 rows, the following operations are performed: 1.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Sort data on disk with 40000 rows
2. Set the program to process less than 40000 rows
3. Perform the following operations:
   a. Save the file as a temporary file
   b. Load the file into memory
   c. Sort the data
   d. Save the file as a temporary file again
